name: Asteroid Boomer
description:
THIS IS MY FIRST EVER GAME 

LET ME GIVE YOU  SOME INTRODUCTION TO MY GAME

IN THIS GAME YOU ONLY HAVE TO SHOOT THE METEORS SOUNDS EASY BUT YOU ONLY HAVE 3 CHANCE IN WHICH THE QUANTITY OF METEORS WILL BE INCREASED BY TIME AND YOU HAVE TO SHOOT THEM TO SURVIVE

I BET YOU CAN'T SURVIVE EVEN 5 MINS!
